set(THIS_PROJECT CryAudioSystem)

project( ${THIS_PROJECT} )

#START-FILE-LIST
# File List auto generated by waf2cmake.py, do not modify manually.

set (SourceGroup_HeaderFiles
	ATL.h
	ATLAudioObject.h
	ATLComponents.h
	ATLEntities.h
	ATLUtils.h
	AudioInternalInterfaces.h
	AudioProxy.h
	AudioSystem.h
	AudioSystemImpl_NULL.h
	FileCacheManager.h
	SoundCVars.h
	resource.h
)
source_group("Header Files" FILES ${SourceGroup_HeaderFiles})


set (SourceGroup_Root
	stdafx.cpp
	stdafx.h
)


set (SourceGroup_SourceFiles
	ATL.cpp
	ATLAudioObject.cpp
	ATLComponents.cpp
	ATLEntities.cpp
	AudioProxy.cpp
	AudioRequests.cpp
	AudioSystem.cpp
	AudioSystemImpl_NULL.cpp
	CryAudioSystem.cpp
	FileCacheManager.cpp
	SoundCVars.cpp
)
source_group("Source Files" FILES ${SourceGroup_SourceFiles})


# Support unity build with uber files
set(CryAudioSystem_uber_0_cpp ${SourceGroup_HeaderFiles} ${SourceGroup_SourceFiles}  )
enable_unity_build( "CryAudioSystem_uber_0.cpp" CryAudioSystem_uber_0_cpp )

set(NoUberFile ${SourceGroup_Root}  )


set (SOURCES
	${CryAudioSystem_uber_0_cpp}
	${NoUberFile}
)
#END-FILE-LIST

include_directories( Common )
include_directories( ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} )

add_library( ${THIS_PROJECT} ${SOURCES})

USE_MSVC_PRECOMPILED_HEADER( ${THIS_PROJECT} "stdafx.h" "stdafx.cpp" )

SET_PLATFORM_TARGET_PROPERTIES( ${THIS_PROJECT} )
